summary: Adds new standalone female Bosmer follower
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][u][size=6][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/14317/]Version for Skyrim Special Edition is HERE[/url]ï»¿[/size]
[/u][/b][/center]

[img]http://jpegshare.net/images/6c/13/6c13094d0b62157ac06910b7139855fb.png[/img]
[font=Kalinga][size=3]This is a reborn of one more old mod of mine. Thaeril is Bosmer archer which you may find in The Drunken Huntsman tavern in Whiterun. She will join you for free. In combat she uses bow, wears light armor and has all perks for her skills plus perks on Stealth and magic resistance. Thaeril doesn't have perks for heavy armor or another types of weapons, so keep it in mind in case of changing her equipment.

Main features:
- Fully standalone follower with own textures, hair, body, bow and armor
- High poly head
- Marriageable[/size]

[img]http://jpegshare.net/images/f9/97/f9975ce7fe83c623f9b1398259acb0b6.png[/img]
[size=3]This mod requires Dawnguard and Dragonborn DLCs. Unpack the archive and place files to your Data folder with rewrite, activate Thaeril.esp in the launcher, enjoy the mod :)

For EEO users: Thaeril's face will not change due to EEO, she has her own head model and will stay as is. There will be no EEO compatible version.[/size][/font][size=3]

[color=#dd7e6b][b][font=Kalinga]IMPORTANT![/font][/b][/color]
[font=Kalinga]How to update for users who maybe have been already using Thaeril as current follower - I moved her to another place so you may have bugs. To avoid bugs, do the following: dismiss Thaeril in game, wait some days, save. Then install the new version, load your save and hire Thaeril again in The Drunken Huntsman.[/font][/size]


[img]http://jpegshare.net/images/84/00/8400f316eea3e9f1cb0cac128221bc3f.png[/img]
[font=Kalinga][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4267357/]TheDNightshade[/url] for test and screenshots :3
dimon99 for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/]DIMONIZED UNP female body[/url]
Erik for [url=http://anvilbay.ru/files/skyrim-highpoly-heads/]Skyrim HighPoly Heads[/url]
Halofarm for [url=http://mod.dysintropi.me/high-poly-feet-and-hands-for-unp-bodies/]High Poly Feet and Hands for UNP Bodies[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1702435]kani_hime[/url] for face & body textures
Xenius for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21082/]Brows[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29977/]Warpaint[/url]
Halendia for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30823/]Iridum eyes[/url]
Kijiko for original [url=http://kijiko.catfood.jp/dcitem/dreadlocks-for-male/]Dreadlocks hairstyle[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4267357/]TheDNightshade[/url] for help with port
Teh-Husky for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50339/]Netch leather armor[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4267357/]TheDNightshade[/url] for textures
InsanitySorrow for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33292/]Unique Uniques bow[/url]
humannature66, Jen, 2pac4eva7 & XunAmarox for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11130/]HN66s Earrings[/url][/size][/font]
